702311f-a.title: Brooklyn: 3rd Street (South) - Driggs Avenue
702311f-a.text:
South 3rd Street, north side, east from Driggs Ave., showing Puhlic
School No. 50.
August 9, 1935.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

704030f-a.title: Brooklyn: Driggs Avenue - 3rd Street (South)
704030f-a.text:
Driggs Ave., west side, between South 3rd and 4th Streets; a view of
the Novelty Theatre. The steeple of the South 3rd Street Presbyterian
Church is seen at the right. On the maps of 1908, a frame 3-story bild-
ing occupied the vacant space to the left of the theatre.
1917.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE RENRODUCED.
